explanation: [0-0] Below the yellow water slide in the water park is a large swimming pool, surrounded by a rest area with many blue-topped tents. A person is playing in the pool, seven or eight people are standing on the yellow floor by the pool, and some people are sitting in the rest area. Behind the rest area are other amusement facilities and buildings in the park.

[0-2] As the camera starts to move forward, a pair of feet appear in the picture, and then the feet slide down the yellow slide quickly. Water flows down the sides of the slide continuously. Finally, at the end of the slide, a large splash of water is seen.

[2-5] The picture switches to three young girls in black swimsuits chatting while standing on the yellow floor.

[5-13] Then the picture switches to the top of the water slide again. You can see the swimming pool with people coming and going below the slide, the rest area around it, other water amusement facilities, and some castle-shaped buildings. Then the camera moves down quickly, and the yellow slide disappears backward out of the picture, with water flowing down the sides of the slide continuously. The picture continues to the end of the slide, splashing a lot of water. Finally, you can see that the water in the pool is blue-green.
